page.title: 14RESIDENTIAL AREAS (PART 2)
page.content: {CONTINUED FROM PAGE 13} To the north and west of Horninglow Rd.,is an area of housing built in the 1960's.Until that time this was land used for agriculture.The houses are mostly semi-detached,although there are some four-blocks and some detached.They are small houses and were intended for first time buyers.The building of this estate greatly increased the number of children on roll at William Hutson and other schools.The fourth area is west of Calais Rd.This is mainly Edwardian terraced housing with small front and rear gardens.Some have been demolished to make way for three small blocks of flats.In this area there is also a post-office and a public house.
